CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the In-Store Promotion stage positioned above or below the Taste Testing stage?
SRP.A: The In-Store Promotion stage is positioned {below} the Taste Testing stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage In-Store Promotion?
VE.A: The value of stage In-Store Promotion is {976}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Customer Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Customer Purchase is {514}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Taste Testing, with a value of {4315}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Repeat Purchase, with a value of {429}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market?
SC.A: Decreased by {1670} Thousand Bottles from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Customer Purchase to stage Repeat Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {85} Thousand Bottles from stage Customer Purchase to stage Repeat Purchase.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Launch in Market to stage Retail Placement?
SC.A: Decreased by {976} Thousand Bottles from stage Launch in Market to stage Retail Placement.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 2157? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Taste Testing} stage has {4315}, the {Launch in Market} stage has {2645}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1322? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {In-Store Promotion} stage has {976}, the {Customer Purchase} stage has {514}, the {Repeat Purchase} stage has {429}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 745 and 2157? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Retail Placement} stage has {1669}, the {In-Store Promotion} stage has {976}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase, or from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Retail Placement} to {In-Store Promotion} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Launch in Market to Retail Placement, from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion, or from stage Customer Purchase to Repeat Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Launch in Market} to stage {Retail Placement} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Taste Testing} and {Launch in Market} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Customer Purchase} and {Repeat Purchase} stages.
